name: Glitch Garden (indiestitious)
description:
My clone of Plants vs. Zombies - a sudo-tower defense game where you construct towers to ward off waves of enemies.

Instructions:

  • Enemies will march from right-to-left --- prevent them from reaching the left-hand side or else it's game over!
  • Select the desired tower from the top menu bar (with your mouse) and select where on the playing field you want to construct it (better to construct
  • Destroy enemies to collect coins, which allow you to construct more towers!
